title: 游戏提示信息怎么汉化!
author: sbary0120
txt_content:
以玩家叫我大王为例。
如何将服务器的下列信息汉化成中文。

[INFO] 叫我大王 was shot by Skeleton
 [INFO] 叫我大王 was slain by Zombie
 [WARNING] Fetching addPacket for removed entity
 [INFO] 叫我大王 lost connection: disconnect.quitting

replies.author: ruienquan
replies.txt_content: 你不是服主无法修改服务器里的信息~

replies.author: wjtcc
replies.txt_content:
玩家死亡信息可以用deathmessage插件实现汉化
其他的那些warning基本汉化不了。
